title: Sai Karthik Ketha | Full-Stack Developer & Entrepreneur

Hey there! I'm Sai Karthik Ketha, a Full-Stack Web Developer and UI/UX Designer based in India, crafting sleek and seamless digital experiences.
Show my work
Your Project is my project
I put client collaboration first, driving open and clear communication
Adaptable to any timezone for communication.
Constantly improving.
My tech stack
NextJS
Express
ReactJS
solidity
javascript
python
Driven by a love for tech and development.
The Inside Scoop
Currently building a Decentralized Charity App
Ready to start a project?
Copy my email address
A small selection of
recent projects
Created Leetcode Clone
A Leetcode clone with a dark mode, and a code editor with syntax highlighting and autocompletion.
Check Github repo
/ui.github.com
Waycup website - group of freelancers
A  designed and deployed website for a group of freelancers, with a blog and a contact form.
Check live site
/ui.waycup.com
Dog Services and Care App UI
A UI design for a dog health app,with all the necessities needed for the dog care  and a clean and modern design.
Check Figma file
/ui.pawsleeves
Music Streaming Service UI
A UI design for a music streaming service, with a light mode and a music player.
Check Figma file
/ui.MusicApp
Spotify Ui Clone
A clone which redesigns the Spotify web player, with a light mode and a music player.
Check Figma file
/ui.musicfy
Apple Iphone Ui Clone
A clone which redesigns the Apple iPhone website, with a dark mode with 3d models using GSAP.
Check Live Site
/ui.iphone
Brainware An Ai website
Brainware is an template for an AI website, with a dark mode and a contact form.
Check Live Site
/ui.brainware
Kind words from
satisfied clients
I would rate your service 5/5⭐️.You have done a fantastic job while doing my work, It was systematic work and it was quick service by Sai Karthik.I expected that it would take more than a week but it took less than that, And i also liked the designs made by Sai karthik. It was quite unique and user friendly designs
Mayank lilani
marketing Head
Sai Karthik has a really amazing work ethic and determination. He stands out for being adaptable and productive, which makes him a great asset to any project.It's amazing how well he can handle several jobs at once and provide excellent outcomes. His persistent dedication and enthusiasm for perfection are absolutely admirable.
Aditya S nair
President of Atal lab at DPSBN
Sai is a highly skilled frontend developer with a strong portfolio that demonstrates his technical expertise, creativity, and dedication to delivering exceptional user experiences. He is well-equipped to take on challenging projects and make a meaningful impact in any development team.
Akash sarangi
Head of the tech team
Website Powered by This
Tech stack
My
work experience
Web developer
Assisted  Many clients in the development of a web-based platform using React.js, enhancing interactivity.
Acted as judge for hackthons for my school
Judged the projects of students in hackathons, providing feedback and guidance.
Freelance Ui/Ux Designer
Made design for dog health app, and a few other projects for clients.
Participated in the Smart India Hackathon
Developed a indegenouos ROV for underwater exploration and surveillance.
My
approach
Phase 1
Blueprint & Vision
Let's work together to define the goals of your website, identify your target audience, and outline the key functionalities you need. We'll cover aspects such as site structure, navigation, and content requirements to ensure everything is aligned with your vision.
Phase 2
Code & Vibes
Once we finalize the plan, I'll set the mood with my rom playlist and dive into coding. From the initial sketches to the final polished code, I'll keep you updated every step of the way.
Phase 3
Build & Go Live
This is where it all comes together! With the approved design in hand, I'll transform it into functional code, meticulously crafting your website from the ground up.
Ready to take
your
digital presence to the next level?
Reach out to me today and let's discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.
Let's get in touch
Copyright © 2024 Sai karthik ketha

Hey there! I'm Sai Karthik Ketha, a Full-Stack Web Developer and UI/UX Designer based in India, crafting sleek and seamless digital experiences.

Kind words from satisfied clients

  • I would rate your service 5/5⭐️.You have done a fantastic job while doing my work, It was systematic work and it was quick service by Sai Karthik.I expected that it would take more than a week but it took less than that, And i also liked the designs made by Sai karthik. It was quite unique and user friendly designs
    Mayank lilanimarketing Head
  • Sai Karthik has a really amazing work ethic and determination. He stands out for being adaptable and productive, which makes him a great asset to any project.It's amazing how well he can handle several jobs at once and provide excellent outcomes. His persistent dedication and enthusiasm for perfection are absolutely admirable.
    Aditya S nairPresident of Atal lab at DPSBN
  • Sai is a highly skilled frontend developer with a strong portfolio that demonstrates his technical expertise, creativity, and dedication to delivering exceptional user experiences. He is well-equipped to take on challenging projects and make a meaningful impact in any development team.
    Akash sarangiHead of the tech team

Website Powered by This Tech stack

My work experience

My approach

Blueprint & Vision

Let's work together to define the goals of your website, identify your target audience, and outline the key functionalities you need. We'll cover aspects such as site structure, navigation, and content requirements to ensure everything is aligned with your vision.

Code & Vibes

Once we finalize the plan, I'll set the mood with my rom playlist and dive into coding. From the initial sketches to the final polished code, I'll keep you updated every step of the way.

Build & Go Live

This is where it all comes together! With the approved design in hand, I'll transform it into functional code, meticulously crafting your website from the ground up.

Ready to take your digital presence to the next level?

Reach out to me today and let's discuss how I can help you achieve your goals.

Copyright © 2024 Sai karthik ketha
